div.div: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, we will have a “contactless” enrollment which will be completed all online. Online enrollment is open beginning Friday, April 24th. We have made a few changes to our enrollment process to enable parents to upload all required enrollment documents and complete necessary forms. We ask that you have your online enrollment completed and documents uploaded by Sunday, May 3rd at 8:00 pm Click below for more information.
div.a: Read More about 2020-2021 Online Kindergarten Roundup

div.div: Due to the closure of Wylie ISD through the end of the school year and the circumstances of COVID-19, our original plans for the 2020 WHS graduation on May 22nd has unfortunately been canceled. We have rescheduled graduation fro Friday, June 19th at 8:00 pm. We will host the ceremony at Bulldog Stadium at the high school. Click below for more information.
div.a: Read More about 2020 Graduation Ceremony Update

a.title: Wylie ISD Closed Remainder of the School Year

div.a: Wylie ISD Closed Remainder of the School Year
div.div: Wylie ISD will remain closed through the end of the 2019-2020 school year, following an Executive Order announced by Texas Governor Greg Abbott. We will continue to serve students through at-home learning for the remainder of the school year. The final day of at-home learning will be Thursday, May 21st which is the last day of this school year. Click below to read Wylie ISD's full statement.
div.a: Read More about Wylie ISD Closed Remainder of the School Year

div.div: Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, we will have a “contactless” Pre-K registration which will be completed all online. Online enrollment is open beginning Friday, April 17th. We have made a few changes to our enrollment process to enable parents to upload all required enrollment documents and complete necessary forms. We ask that you have your online enrollment completed and documents uploaded by Tuesday, April 21st at 8:00 pm. Click below for instruction on how to begin the process.
div.a: Read More about 2020-2021 Pre-K Registration-Online Enrollment

a.title: New Student Enrollment For Current School Year

div.a: New Student Enrollment For Current School Year
div.div: Any student who is enrolling for the CURRENT school year (2019-2020), please complete an online enrollment application as our process moves completely online due to the COVID-19 pandemic. You will need to upload the required documents during the enrollment process. Click below for more information.
div.a: Read More about New Student Enrollment For Current School Year

div.div: We are launching an online learning resource website that has been created for all grades. Each week there will be new lessons added for grades PK-4 that your child will have access to for their at-home learning. There are also links to resources for all grades. Click the Quick Link on the left side of the District website or click the link below.
div.a: Read More about Online Learning Resources Grades PK-4

div.div: Here is some very important info regarding, at-home learning, technology and Google Classroom. We are continuously working to give you information each day that will help ease this transition and answer questions that you have.
div.a: Read More about At Home Learning

span.br: If questions arise, we encourage you to reach out by email to your campuses and we will get back to you as soon as we can. This will be the best way to get in contact with someone during the closure.

br.br:
